00035            write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' n_min: ', rho_min

00037            write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' x_sol: ', plasma_centre(1)-x_plasma/2.+lolam*(1-rho_min)
00038 
00039         endif
00040 
00041         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.4)') ' Ion spacing a: ',a_ii

00056

00058         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' N_c: ',4*pi/3.*(eps/a_ii)**3
00059         write (ifile,'(a20,f12.3)') ' R/lambda_De: ',eps/(max(vte,1.e-8))
